overview: Get ready for a taste of Budapest, Hungary. Get a taste of the culture, get a taste of the sights, and most importantly, get a hearty a taste of the men. Olympus director Roland Dane takes you there on a journey of erotic discovery. Get a sense of everyday life among the locals as a bevy of young, uncut, muscled and horny men prowl the city, hooking up with each other and finding secluded getaways to indulge in their Man Hungry desires.
title: Man Hungry
